description: Part of the East Coast Trail Network.  Great Coastal hike.  Excellent photo opportunities.  Hikers should be aware that a small portion of the trail passes on back of the Robin Hood Bay dump and depending upon the wind direction there may be an unpleasant odor.
directions: About a 10 minute drive from downtown to the Ocean Sciences Centre located in Logy Bay.  The trail ends at Quidi Vidi Village so it is recommend you have a second vehicle already positioned or you can call a cab.
title: Sugarloaf Path
